content.prompt: The use of objects such as the one shown in the image best illustrates which of the following historical processes from 1450 to 1750 ?

choices.label: Some Asian states sought to limit foreign encroachment in their internal affairs.
Political leaders in Asia commissioned works of art to legitimize their rule.
Religious conversion by state rulers was often followed by the mass conversion of state populations.
The territorial expansion of Asian land-based empires limited European influence in many parts of Asia.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
